NK041(di)001:1: // 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs so //
NK041(di)001:2: las gang zhig rtsom pa na thog mar 'di tshar
NK041(di)001:3: gcig brjod na grub pa bde ba yid bzhin du
NK041(di)001:4: byed par 'gyur bas ci nas yid la bya'o ///
NK041(di)001:5: snang srid rnam dag rang bzhin lhun grub pa'i //
NK041(di)001:6: bkra shis phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa yi //
NK041(di)001:7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun 'phags pa'i tshogs //
NK041(di)001:8: kun la phyag 'tshal bdag cag bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)001:9: sgron me'i rgyal bo rtsal brtan don grub dgongs //
NK041(di)001:10: byams pa'i rgyan dpal dge grags dpal dam pa //
NK041(di)001:11: kun la dgongs pa rgya cher grags pa can //
NK041(di)001:12: lhun po ltar 'phags rtsal grags dpal dang ni //
NK041(di)001:13: sems can thams cad la dgongs grags pa'i dpal //
NK041(di)001:14: yid tshim mdzad pa rtsal rab grags dpal te //
NK041(di)001:15: mtshan tsam thos pa'i bkra shis dpal 'phel ba //
NK041(di)001:16: bde bar gshegs pa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)001:17: 'jam dpal gzhon nu dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
NK041(di)001:18: spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po byams pa'i dpal //
NK041(di)001:19: sa yi snying po sgrib pa rnam par sel //
NK041(di)001:20: nam mkha'i snying po 'phags mchog kun tu bzang //
NK041(di)001:21: ut+pala rdo rje pad dkar klu shing dang //
NK041(di)001:22: nor bu zla ba ral gri nyi ma yi //
NK041(di)001:23: phyag mtshan legs bsnams bkra shis dpal gyi mchog /
NK041(di)001:24: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)001:25: rin chen gdugs mchog bkra shis gser gyi nya //
NK041(di)001:26: 'dod 'byung bum bzang yid 'ong ka ma la //
NK041(di)001:27: snyan grags dung dang phun tshogs dpal be'u //
NK041(di)001:28: mi nub rgyal mtshan dbang bsgyur 'khor lo ste //
NK041(di)001:29: rin chen rtags mchog brgyad kyi phyag mtshan can //
NK041(di)001:30: phyogs dus rgyal ba mchod cing dgyes bskyed ma //
NK041(di)001:31: sgeg sogs ngo bo dran pas dpal spel ba'i //
NK041(di)001:32: bkra shis lha mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)001:33: tshangs pa chen po bde 'byung sred med bu //
NK041(di)001:34: mig stong ldan dang rgyal po yul 'khor srung //
NK041(di)001:35: 'phags skyes po dang klu dbang mig mi bzang //
NK041(di)001:36: rnam thos sras te lha rdzas 'khor lo dang //
NK041(di)001:37: tri shu la dang mdung thung rdo rje can //
NK041(di)001:38: pi wam ral gri mchod rten rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
NK041(di)001:39: sa gsum gnas su dge legs bkra shis spel //
NK041(di)001:40: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)001:41: bdag cag deng 'dir bya ba rtsom pa la //
NK041(di)001:42: gegs dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun zhi nas //
NK041(di)001:43: 'dod don dpal 'phel bsam don yid bzhin 'grub //
NK041(di)001:44: bkra shis bde legs phun sum tshogs par shog /
NK041(di)001:45: ldang tshe brjod na de nyin don kun 'grub //
NK041(di)001:46: nyal tshe brjod na rmi lam bzang por mthong //
NK041(di)001:47: g.yul du 'jug tshe brjod na phyogs las rgyal //
NK041(di)001:48: bya ba rtsom dus brjod na 'dod don 'phel //
NK041(di)001:49: rgyun du brjod na tshe dpal grags 'byor shis //
NK041(di)001:50: bde legs phun tshogs bsam don yid bzhin 'grub //
NK041(di)001:51: sdig sgrib kun byang mngon mtho nges legs kyi //
NK041(di)001:52: don kun 'grub par rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs //
NK041(di)001:53: rab tshes me sprel zla 5tshes 3gza' nyi ma dang
NK041(di)001:54: rgyu skar rgyal gyi dus bzang po'i cha la 'jam
NK041(di)001:55: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i yid mtsho las byung ba
NK041(di)001:56: nor bu'i do shal chen po mang+ga lam //
NK041(di)001:59: bkra shis tshigs bcad spar bskrun byas pa'i mthus //
NK041(di)001:60: bkra mi shis pa'i rigs kun zhi ba dang //
NK041(di)001:61: bkra shis snod bcud kun la khyab pa yis //
NK041(di)001:62: bkra shis phyogs dus kun tu rgyas gyur cig /
